data.title: Farzi: Vijay Sethupathi earned Rs 7 Crore, find out how many Crores Shahid Kapoor & others charged
data.meta_description: Created by famed director duo Raj and DK, Farzi features Shahid Kapoor, Vijay Sethupathi, Kay Kay Menon and Raashi Khanna in leading roles
data.text:
Bollywood star Shahid Kapoor makes his digital debut with famed director duo Raj and DK's edge-of-the-seat thriller Farzi. The much-awaited series which premiered on Amazon Prime Video on February 10, revolves around a small-time artist who gets dragged into the world of counterfeiting for a high stake con job when he makes a perfect fake note. The story takes an interesting turn when an honest cop and a gangster get involved. In addition to Kapoor, Farzi also features Vijay Sethupathi, Raashi Khanna, Kay Kay Menon and Regina Cassandra in prominent roles.

While Vijay Sethupathi took home a whopping pay cheque of Rs 7 crore for his performance in the show, find out how many crores Shahid Kapoor, Raashi Khanna and other actors charged for their roles in Amazon Prime Video's new series.

Farzi: Vijay Sethupathi earned Rs 7 Crore, find out how many Crores Shahid Kapoor & others charged

1. Vijay Sethupathi

National Film Award-winning actor Vijay Sethupathi, who impressed critics and cinephiles with his strong anti-hero actor in Kamal Haasan starrer Vikram last year, essays the role of Michael Vedanayagam, a Special Task Force officer in Farzi. According to Financial Express, the renowned actor took home a whopping pay cheque of Rs. 7 crore. Sethupathi has already bagged an important role in filmmaker Atlee's upcoming thriller Jawan which is headlined by Shah Rukh Khan.

2. Kay Kay Menon

Actor Kay Kay Menon, who essays the role of a gangster (Mansoor Dalal) in the newly arrived series created by Raj and DK, charged a stupendous amount of Rs. 2.5 crore, according to a Financial Express report.

3. Raashi Khanna

Instagram content

This content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.

After sharing screen space with Ajay Devgn in Disney+ Hotstar's psychological thriller Rudra: The Edge of Darkness (a remake of the British series Luther) last year, actress Raashi Khanna has now teamed up with Shahid Kapoor, Vijay Sethupathi and Kay Kay Menon for Raj and DK's series Farzi. According to Financial Express, the actress earned Rs. 1.5 crore for her performance as a Reserve Bank of India officer in Amazon Prime Video's new series.

4. Shahid Kapoor

Shahid Kapoor, who makes his OTT debut with Farzi, charged a massive amount of Rs. 30 crore to headline the series. While his last theatrical outing Jersey struggled to excel at the box office, the 41-year-old actor would be hoping to hit the right notes with his newly released series which dives into the world of counterfeiting.
